page.title: 17LYDFORD TRADESMAN
page.content: In 1925 Mr.J.Hannaford started a butcher's shop in Lydford.He used to deliver his meat to his customers by horse and cart. This was a slow way of delivering his meat and also the flies got at the meat because the meat was not covered.Mr. Hannaford got his meat locally from farmers.The animals were killed daily in his slaughter house. Nowadays his son runs the business.He is called Mr .S.Hannaford He gets his meat from an Abattoir and it comes by lorry which keeps it fresh. Mr. Hannaford keeps his meat in a fridge. His best customers are the Inns and Hotels. He delivers his meat in a van.
